you go girl!!!

--- On Mon, 1/24/11, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...=
> wrote:


From: Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC]=
 Re: 10-4
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, January 24, 2011, 4:49 =
PM


=C2=A0 



Thank you, Snow! And, guys, I refuse to censor myself, my s=
peech or my thoughts or my actions out of fear of debunkers. I refuse to hi=
de/deny what I hear, from myself. If we do that, we miss out on finding out=
 the WHOLE truth, in all its intricacies. We shortchange OURSELVES. You kno=
w I've done that my whole life just to fit in - denied my own truth and int=
uition, (as most people do) and I'm not about to start doing it here. This =
is too sacred, and too real. Frank, you saw what one debunker did recently.=
 Their arguments DIDN'T EVEN MAKE SENSE and were complete lies. They will l=
ie through their teeth, whether or not we say something that looks like it =
might be "fodder". Everything we do is BS to them. They don't even take the=
 time to analyze our counterarguments. I'm extremely confident that what we=
 are getting is paranormal, and I have no qualms discussing it in full deta=
il.

I wrote an article for Tim Woolworth's website Ghost Boxer at itcvoice=
s.org. Please check out the website, and I would LOVE to get some feedback =
on my article here: 

http://itcvoices.org/wordpress/?p=3D153

--- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com, Snowfire Lioness <SnowfireL@...> wrote:
>
> I have plen=
ty of files of someone over there saying my whole name, and I mean first mi=
ddle and last name, and in reverse as well, these folks over there are stil=
l living!=C3=82=C2=A0 sf
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From=
: Adriana Jones adrianamjones@...
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Mon=
, Jan 24, 2011 4:47 pm
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 10-4
> 
> =C3=82=C2=A0 Fran=
k, I realize how this sounds, but it's not debunker fodder. They truly have=
 said 10-4, and more than once. And this doesn't invalidate ANYTHING. I kno=
w for a FACT, Frank, that these voices are truly anomalous, based on a prec=
ise validation method I started using which looks at the length of the mess=
ages. They not only 10-4 but they say everything else under the sun, which =
has nothing to do with police scanners or anything of that sort. And a lot =
of it I've validated to be without a doubt anomalous, based on the message =
length... I think they may like to use ten-code... that's my suspicion... a=
nd I'd like to see if I'm right. Also I've made two compilation sound files=
 each lasting 20 some seconds long, which are compilations of all the "help=
 me"s I've received from a 5 minute and a 7 minute session. Debunk that, de=
bunkers! I feel that what we get across these ghost boxes is yes, ghosts, b=
ut also so much more than that. I don't know what, and
 it's painful not kn=
owing, but based on the VARIETY of messages I've received, it's just amazin=
g, it's absolutely amazing,and I don't know what it is...
> 
> --- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" purplealiengirl@ wrote:
> >
> &g=
t; That's debunker fodder! Some claim we just hear snippets of radio broadc=
asts along with CB radio. You can get harmonics, espcially if someone in th=
e area is running an illegal amplifier. There can also be some mixing of si=
gnals under certain conditions, mixing combines combines signals, resulting=
 in different frequency products. I am not saying that is what this radio j=
argon is, it might be an indication "they" are using some form of transmiss=
ion, and trying to indicate it. 
> > 
> > When I do those test vidoes=
, the cellphone announces "Look here" when it starts, and the radios pick t=
hat up. I'd listen for content, and personal messages, and ignore anything =
that seems unrelated to questions, or spirit contact. It can get really con=
fusing. Some take every word as meanigful, even the ones that are clearly a=
 sports annoucer, or car salesman. The Jesus broascasts that are so common =
in this country can add a layer of confusion.
> > 
> > F-S
> > 
> =

 wrote:

respond. If anyone else wants to do this, please let

at results you get.
> > > 
> > > Thanks.
> > > 
> > &g=
t; Adriana.
